bill.summary:
Hudson-Mohawk River Basin Act
This bill requires the Department of Interior to establish: (1) a program to restore the Hudson-Mohawk River Basin region in New York and New Jersey, and (2) a Hudson-Mohawk River Basin Grant Program.
